rules_text:
When this creature enters, attempt a ritual. [i](Start a ritual or move to the next step.)[/i]
{3}{U}: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 0/0 artifact creature. Put four +1/+1 counters on it. If you've completed a ritual, also put a vigilance counter on it.
flavor_text: [i]“Nothing a bit of polish can't fix.”[/i]
